title: Erazm's Author Page
content:
**Author Name:** Erazm

**About:** Hello. I like the creepy, the silly, and the socialist. I read all of the feedback that gets left on my articles. I've made substantial edits to my pages based upon thoughtful comments more than once. I appreciate the time and effort you put in as a reader and hope that all of my pages end up feeling worth your while. 

**Likes:** Interesting objects, the 'pure' lab report format from Series I, unsolved mysteries, the supportive nature of the community.

**Dislikes:** Corny dialogue, rigid adherence to a particular vision of the 'Foundation' or the people working within it, excessive reliance on narrative gimmicks, unhelpful critique. (the struggle we all share).

I am at constant war with the ancient HTML / IRC formats that this site continues to use in the 21st century. Thanks for your patience. 

__SCPs__:

**__Outside media:__**

Some talented folks have created their own content based on my work (in accordance with the Creative Commons 3.0 license). Give them a look!

//Articles://

* SCP-2411 translated: [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-2411 Japanese] (by [http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/c-dives C-Dives]); [http://fondationscp.wikidot.com/scp-2411 French], [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-2411 Chinese]; [http://scpfoundation.net/scp-2411 Russian]

* SCP-4526 translated: [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4526 Chinese]

* SCP-5172 translated: [http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/scp-5172 Italian]

* Mr. Parker translated:  [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/mr-parker Japanese] (by [http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/fumeinadebaisu fumeinadebaisu]); [http://ko.scp-wiki.net/mr-parker Korean], [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/mr-parker Spanish]; [http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/mr-parker Chinese (Modern)], [http://scp-zh-tr.wikidot.com/mr-parker Chinese (Traditional)]

* [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzULZu32KV0&ab_channel=%E7%94%9F%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0%E7%BE%8E%E5%91%B3%E3%81%97%E3%81%84%E3%82%88channel 【ゆっくり解説】SCP-2411 総務] (Japanese), by [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjs5hqhQ_fBMjxXvJC5TGig 生クリーム美味しいよchannel]

* [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WvdX14-DPMs&ab_channel=%D0%A1%D0%A6%D0%9F%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8F SCP-5172 - Генераторы ледяных существ (SCP Animation)] (Russian), by [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrrpGAsB4dG2-K2e71iBuDA СЦП анимация]
